courses.description: Study the properties, classifications, and trends of elements organized in the periodic table.
courses.title: Chemistry

courses.description: Explore how elements bond and interact chemically, forming the basis of the periodic table.
courses.title: Chemical Bonding

courses.description: Understand the structure of atoms, including protons, neutrons, and electrons, which define the periodic table.
courses.title: Atomic Theory

courses.description: Learn about metals, nonmetals, metalloids, and their placement and characteristics in the periodic table.
courses.title: Inorganic Chemistry

courses.description: Discover the historical development and organization of the periodic table.
courses.title: History of Chemistry
